message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $1500000. I think this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to meet you halfway and come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the market value, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to compromise, but I think $1350000 is a more reasonable price considering the product's unique features and my initial offer. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go below this price.
